description: figures--men, women and children--with fish in baskets; horse grazing at center; dog at left; boats in background at right
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [ LLC in the print, in black: [S. De Vliger]
provenance: Adolphe Mouilleron, Lugt 147 (1820-1881), Paris. [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1995; sold in August for NOOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1995-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Les Pecheurs (Fishermen)
